snippet.title: Announcing: Trackless
snippet.description:
Trackless is an immersive text based puzzle game. Become the Seeker, journey into the unknown, and find “The Object.”

Fig was created to bring fans together to publish games of all kinds. Our goal is to strike a balance between titles from well-known independent studios as well as ones from up-and-coming indie teams. 

Looking for more information on Fig crowdfunding? 

Polygon: http://www.polygon.com/2015/12/1/9827884/literally-anyone-can-invest-in-figs-next-game 

Forbes: http://www.forbes.com/sites/amyfeldman/2016/04/06/fig-offers-a-new-model-of-crowdfunding-for-video-games-that-mixes-investing-with-rewards/#5b8be2ca4498

And of course the Fig site itself (with our handy crowdfunding FAQ!): https://www.fig.co/about
